dataList.content: Are you sure you want to skip?
※ Spent Enkephalin Modules will not be refunded.

Please check your Internet connection.
※ Maximum capacity is 100; expired mail will be <color=#990000>deleted</color>.
※ Items claimed at the mailbox may be subject to cancellation restrictions.

You’re currently exploring Episode {0}’s Story Dungeon.
Forfeit your progress and enter a new dungeon?

Insufficient Thread.
Go to the Shard::Thread Exchange?

Insufficient Enkephalin.
Would you like to recharge your Enkephalin?

You don’t have enough Enkephalin Boxes.
Would you like to go purchase some?
3★ Identity or E.G.O assured in {0} Extractions
※ Up to {1} cases over the last {0} days are displayed.

You don’t have enough Enkephalin Modules.
Would you like to go assemble some?

In compliance with the 「Voluntary Restraint Guidelines of Korea Association of Game Industry」, detailed rates for chance-based items are disclosed here.

Individual rates are rounded up from the fifth digit after the decimal point. The actual sum is applied as 100%.

In [10 Extractions], at least 1 Identity with a rarity of 2★ or higher will be extracted.

The table for the 10th Extraction is as follows:

Below is the list of Identities and E.G.O you can obtain following the aforementioned rates.

The list may change in certain seasons; upcoming changes to the reward tables will be announced in advance.

E.G.O is extracted non-repetitively; E.G.O acquired through any means, including Extraction, Dispenser, and redemption from the mailbox, will be excluded from the Extraction table. As long as there is E.G.O remaining in the table of possible results, the chance of extracting E.G.O in Extraction does not change. Therefore, the chance of acquiring specific E.G.O will increase as more extractions are performed.
If there is no E.G.O remaining in the table due to the user acquiring all of them, the rates for [1 Extraction] and [10 Extraction] will change accordingly to the following:

In Target Extractions, certain Identities and E.G.O have higher extraction rates.

Target Identities account for 50% of the probabilities for their respective rarities; the rates are evenly shared among them.

The other 50% of probabilities are evenly distributed between the non-targeted Identities in the table.

The same applies to Target E.G.O.

Changes in probabilities for Target Extractions do not affect the chances of items of certain types and rarities appearing.

★ Egoshards
When you extract an Identity or E.G.O you already own, you will get Egoshards of the character, its quantity depending on the item’s type and rarity.

Egoshards can only be used for a set period. When the expiration date arrives, 50% of the Egoshards in possession are carried over to the next season.

The remaining Egoshards are converted to Thread.

The same applies to Egoshard Crates.

Players will be notified of the upcoming season change and expiration of Egoshards and Egoshard Crates sometime before the expiration date.
The Identity’s stats at max level and Uptie tier are displayed here.
The E.G.O is displayed at its max tier here.
※ Up to {0} claimed items will be displayed in the history.
No mail available to claim with “Claim All”
Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial?
※ Refund may be restricted after redeeming the item.

A new download has been added.
Returning to the title screen.
Would you like to skip the battle?
This extraction banner does not include E.G.O.
The 2★ and 3★ Identities in this extraction banner belong to Season {0}.

An error has occurred.
Returning to the title screen.
The rates for a single Extraction are as follows.
The table for one use of {0} is as follows.
When you use {0}, you can choose one currency from the following.
When you have selected the currency, the table for acquiring different quantities of the set currency by using one {0} is as follows.
※ “{0}” in the lower table is an example for selecting one of the currencies from the table above.
※ If you select 2 or more Announcers at once, the dialogue to play will be randomly chosen. (Up to 10)
A portion of the Egoshards you own will be carried over to the current season.
The Egoshards that have not been carried over are converted into Thread.
A portion of the Egoshard Crates (both random & nominable) you own will be carried over to the current season.
The Egoshard Crates that have not been carried over are converted into Thread Crates.
Currencies from the previous season will be converted into the current season.

During a banner, you can gain ‘Yisang’ [Ideality] based on the number of extractions you’ve done.
After collecting a certain amount, you can exchange it for a 3★ Identity or E.G.O represented on the banner.

※ Ideality is not shared between banners; Ideality in each is considered its own currency.
※ After the banner is over, the remaining Ideality is converted into Thread.
{1} Yisang [Ideality] from {0} has been converted to Thread.
Spend 200 Yisang [Ideality] and make this exchange?
You already own the selected Identity. Exchange 200 Yisang [Ideality] for this Sinner's 50 Identity Shards?
In this battle, <color=#990000>up to {0}</color> Sinners can participate in combat.
Certain stages may allow more Sinners to participate in battle compared to the previous stage played. In this case, the 'Edit Team' area will flicker.
You may not bring {0}'s Support Identity for this dungeon.

Upon entry, you will no longer be able to travel to other nodes of the dungeon; {0} will fully heal HP and have their SP reset to 0.
Are you sure you want to proceed?
For this dungeon, you may not select a Support Identity for Yi Sang. Yi Sang must always participate in battles.
※ The Max Manager Level may be raised with future updates.
※ Cannot be purchased during this period.

Obtaining a duplicate of an already-owned Announcer will convert it to Thread Crates.

These Thread Crates will be carried over as-is to the next Season.
This story takes place after the Main Story Chapter {0}. Would you like to view the story anyway?
You already own the selected Announcer. Exchange 200 Yisang [Ideality] for 50 Thread Crates?

Below is the list of Identities, E.G.O, and Announcers you can obtain following the aforementioned rates.

The list may change in certain seasons; upcoming changes to the reward tables will be announced in advance.
Can raise Uptie Tier & Identity Level
[{0}] Identity's Uptie Tier & Level will be changed as follows.
The selected Identity's Uptie Tier cannot be raised further.
The selected Identity's Level cannot be raised further.
Once you unlink, you will not be able to unlink again for {0} days.

Account unlinking complete.
Returning to the title screen.
The level cap for your Identities have been raised.

Using this ticket at your current story progress will raise your selected Identity's level to {1} instead of {0}, and any unused EXP in that process will be lost.

Will you use this ticket anyway?
EXP Luxcavation #7 (Slash) opens on MON, TUE, and SUN.
EXP Luxcavation #7 (Pierce) opens on WED, THU, and SUN.
EXP Luxcavation #7 (Blunt) opens on FRI, SAT, and SUN.
Cannot proceed with this {0} Identity. Support Identities added.

Seasonal ID & E.G.O can be Dispensed starting from {0}/{1} {2} ({3})

Earn rewards based on your attendance during the Event period. Rewards are automatically claimed when the pop-up window appears.

Collect 14 cumulative attendance checks to receive all rewards.

Select the Sinners to set the Deployment order.

EXP Luxcavation #8 (Pierce) opens on WED, THU, and SUN.
